text: It's about time. Are you ready?
I'm still feeling excited right now.

Producer-san told us, right?
To enjoy the excitement.

The preparation period, the lessons
I did think about them, but...

I also imagined the excitement of standing here in my
costume and made sure to enjoy it. Of course, I still am...

Right now... I'm feeling a bit busy
with excitement and nervousness.

Haha, being busy with emotions is also
Mikoto's privilegeâ€”so enjoy it!
